document_data.name: Great War of the Burrow
document_data.mainbody: The '''Great War of the Burrow''' was, allegedly, a historic event that took place in [[Purfbin Doogrick]]'s home burrow, sometime before [[1372 DR]].
document_data.History: The Great War of the Burrow was fueled by one of the strongest [[gnomish]] emotions - hunger. One of the War's great heroes was [[Fizbang Blartknocker]], a famous individual, among those who hailed from the same burrow Purfbin Doogrick was born in, somewhere in [[Faer√ªn]].
